data.text: Balua yi' niandike nenga na Pauli, ntumisi wa Nnu'ngu' na ntumilwe wa Yesu Kilisitu. Nitumilwe kwa kitumbu sa kwayi'gana bandu babasaulilwe na Nnu'ngu' li'nga bapate kumwu'bi'lya no tanga ukakape waulu'a kwalongoya tama maisa magolou,
na kwapeya mau'bi'lyo go li'nda ukoto wangayomoka. Nnu'ngu', ywangali longela ubu'su', aalagi ukoto wo kubile balo ata umbilwa kwa dunia.
Lakini, munsimu wake Nnu'ngu' aumukwi liyi'gi'yo lyake. Naakamukiyilwe nwaya liyi'gi'yo lyo na Nnu'ngu', Nkosopoli witu.
Nikuandikya wa Tito, wamwana wangu' wa kakape muimani yatuiu'bi'lya. Nikulu'bya ngu'ngu' na amani bu'ka kwa Nnu'ngu' Tati' na Kilisitu Yesu, Nkosopoli witu.
Naakulei kunni'ma wa Kilete li'nga ubi'ke wiso makowe gagaaigile, pamope no sawa api'ndo ba kanisa kwa kila kilambo, kati mu'lu' mwanaakulagile.
Mpi'ndo wa kanisa apalikwa kaneabe na lukoolo na mundu, abe nnalu'me wa nnwawa yumo. Bana bake bapalikwa babe babau'bi'lile bangali sitakilwa kwa makowe ga umbu'ku'su' wala kotoka yu'wa.

Nnyi'mi'li'ki wa kanisa apalikwa panga mundu ywangali bi'ki'lwa lukoolo kwa mwanjaa akamukiyilwe lyengo lya Nnu'ngu'. Kwa nyo kaneabe mundu ywakwipuna, ywayu'ngu'ya usika, nnobya wi'mbi', mwene nnomo wala pala mbanje kwa ndi'la ndau.
Ila abe mundu ywapenda kwapokya ageni wiso, ywapenda panga makowe manogau, mwene ikima, mwene aki, mpeleteu na ywawesa kwiyi'mi'li'ka mwene.
Apalikwa kamwa Liyi'gi'yo lya kakape kati mwaliyi'ganilwa, li'nga awese kwakangamaya bi'ngi' kwa mayi'gano ga kakape na kwakalipya balu' babagataukya mayi'gano ago.
Kwa mwanjaa babile bandu baingi, muno balu' babau'bi'lile bu'ka mudini ya Kiyahudi, bembe bayu'wali na baaobeya bi'ngi' kwa mayi'gi'yo ga kilalo.
Bapalikwa bakanikiyilwe, kwa mwanjaa baaobeya bandu bu'ka nsengo gumo ata wi'ngi' kwo yi'gana mayi'gi'yo gangali palikwa li'nga bapate mali kwa ndi'la ya ukongi.
Kwaabile na nnondoli yumo ywabe Nkilete ywaabaite panga,
Ukong'ondeli wu'no wa kakape. Kwa nyo wakwi'li'ke kwa ukali' li'nga bapate baa na imani yaitimile.
Bakotoke pi'kania u'mo ya Kiyahudi yangali maana yoyoti, na malagyo ga bandu babaukana ukakape.

Kwa balu' bababile na mwoyo nnogau, kila kili'be kwabe kipeleteu. Lakini ntu'pu' sosoti sakipanga kipeleteu kwa bandu asapu na bangali u'bi'lya Nnu'ngu', kwa mwanjaa malango na myoyo yabe itwi'li usapu.
Bembe babaya panga bantangite Nnu'ngu', lakini iyendo yabe ilaya mpu'la panga bendakunkana. Baatisukilwa, bangali yu'wa, na bangali pwaika mulikowe lyolyoti li'lu' linogau.
